#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int n,q;
	int i,j;
	long long int  test;
	int count;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>q;
		long long int *a=new long long int[n];
		long long int *b=new long long int[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i]>>b[i];
		}
		for(i=0;i<q;i++)
		{
			cin>>test;
			count=0;
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
			//	cout<<"entering"<<endl;
				if((a[j]<=test)&&(test<=b[j]))
				{
					cout<<"NO"<<endl;
			//		cout<<a[j]<<" "<<b[j]<<endl;
					count=1;
					break;
				}
			}
				if(count==0)
				{
					cout<<"YES"<<endl;
				}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
